about_the_game:
ROSHAMBOSS is a 3v1 boss-battling party game for 4 friends based on the classic game of Rock Paper Scissors.

To play the game, 1 player chooses a Boss with unique passives and abilities that break the rules of Rock Paper Scissors. The other 3 players build their team from a roster of superpowered Heroes.

The goal of the game is to outwit the Boss to reduce their HP to 0—but beware, the heroes will have to pick up on the Boss’s patterns and work together if they're going to survive.

WHAT OUR TESTERS SAY

  • "It's like poker, but for people who want it to be more interesting."
  • "There's no way it's scissors."
  • "He's definitely a paper boy."
  • "It's 100% rock."

EVERY MATCH IS DIFFERENT

Roshamboss is designed so that it's easy to learn and every match feels different:
  • 20-minute games
  • Use game-changing abilities and ultimates to shape your outcomes
  • Uncover powerful synergies and surprising team plays
  • Quickly find games online from the lobby list
  • Read your friends' minds or bluff your way to victory

BUILT BY A SMALL TEAM

Gumption Games is a small team of 5 friends, but we have big plans for Roshamboss.
  • 20+ Bosses with a unique playstyles and win conditions
  • 80+ Heroes designed and ready for testing
  • Built for crossplatform play between PC, console, Android, and iOS

Check the game out during Steam Next Fest in October!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7970

short_description: An asymmetric (3vs1) game of Rock Paper Scissors with bluffs, banter, and abilities where three players take on the role of Heroes to battle the Boss. Built for you and 3 friends.
